item.title: Binary search I
item.description: Bianary Search I Today’s topic is binary search. First, let’s start with an easy question. Given an sorted a array of n elements, write a function to search a given element x in this array. The straightforward solution is simple, we can iterate this array and compare each element with x. This solution is also called linear search. The time complexity is O(N). Can it be better? Sure, the answer is binary search.
